    ball.theta += d_theta
interactions.output:
from vpython import *

# Cyber input variable mapping
Length_I = 10
Radius_I = 1

# Create the scene of the pendulum
scene = canvas(title='Simple Pendulum', width=800, height=800, center=vector(0,-Length_I/2,0), background=color.white)
# Create the ceiling
ceiling = box(length=0.2, height=0.01, width=0.2, pos=vector(0,0,0))
# Create the ball
ball = sphere(radius=Radius_I, color=color.red)

# Create the rod
rod = cylinder(radius=0.01)

# Initialize
ball.pos = vector(Length_I,0,0)
rod.axis = ball.pos
ball.v = vector(0,0,0)
ball.m = 1
g = 9.8
ball.theta = 30 * pi / 180
ball.omega = 0
t = 0
dt = 0.01
new_value = Length_I  # Define new_value

while t < 10:
    rate(100)
    Length_I = new_value 
    ball.pos = vector(Length_I*sin(ball.theta), -Length_I*cos(ball.theta), 0)
    alpha = - g / Length_I * sin(ball.theta)
    ball.omega += alpha * dt
    d_theta = ball.omega * dt
    ball.theta += d_theta
    t += dt  # Update the time
